6010 '    **** BE SURE AND USE A C-60 TAPE FOR YOUR DATA TAPE!!!!
6020 ' ADVENTURE DATA TAPE BUILDER. BUILDER/BAS
6030 ' VERSION 1.3 (C) SCOTT ADAMS '80.
6040 ' ADVENTURE INTERNATIONAL BOX 3435 LONGWOOD FL 32750
6050 ' PHONE (305)-862-6917
6060 ' BUILDS DATA TAPE FOR ORIGINAL BASIC VERSION OF PIRATE'S ADVENTURE
6070 'PLEASE NOTE ON LINES THAT SUDDENLY GO TO THE
NEXT LINE LIKE
THIS USE (DOWN ARROW) KEY WHICH IS RIGHT ABOVE
THE LEFT HAND SHIFT KEY ON YOUR TRS-80!
